name: Si Alpha EverDawn
description:
This is a Solo created Short inspired by H.P. Lovecraft-ish. Si Alpha Ever Dawn is a  Mind Twisting Thriller style Experience, made in 2 weeks for the SenScape Adventurous Game Jam... UPDATED VERSION v1.02a ** released 12/14/2021. The Major Issues are Fixed Up, and it's ready to try again... This time to the End.

The year is 1991, and Lenard has just finished his last year of High School. He has everything for his future plan out, and he just landed a really nice job. He's been a pretty good Interior Painter for almost a year now, and his Brother-n-Law needs Lenard to paint the interior of a pretty old house. That's where  this story comes in...

You Play as Lenard, a 19yr old "Go-Getter", with a painting job to do on an old house. A place with nobody to look over you, and to take it easy on the job for a change. The Paint and all the other stuff is there. All you need to do is show up, and start painting the inside of the house.... Right?

This is a Short 10-15 min game, with a story to go along with my other "Project" called Just One Night -the initiation-. A good Atmospheric thriller adventure that will pull you in. This is only my Second time using Unreal Engine so don't be to hard on me.

                                                - HINT -

Don't forget to pick up the Paint Cans, and Flashlight from the shed. Before you go into the house... The Inside is pretty dark, I don't want you stumping you toe or anything...

This "May" turn into a little bigger "Project" in the future. If you guys are interested, and think I should? Let me know in the comments. Hope you guys Enjoy the Short.

**Had to Re-Upload the game due to being an Installer version, and not an Standard .exe Launcher. Now there's no need to install the game. Just UnZip, Launch, and Enjoy. Hope there was No Inconvenience. I also changed the version to v1.02a to reflect the change.

Now works with DirectX 11 and DirectX 12. See my Dev Logs on this game for more In-Depth Progress details. 

Thanks and Enjoy,

The Twisted Monk.

__________________________________________________________________________________

                                            -Installation-

1. Download the Zip file.

2. Unpack.

3. Open the Ever Dawn folder.

4. Launch, Play, and Enjoy.

__________________________________________________________________________________

Graphicly Demanding (but still needs more optimization) 

CPU: Quad Core @ 3.0 ghz or better.

Memory: 8 GB or more.

Graphics Card: -DirectX 11- RX 570 4gb / GTX 970 4gb or better.

Storage: 5gb of free Drive space

Mouse, Keyboard, Headphones/Speakers, Monitor, etc..
